comments.raw_text: We would like to know how much memory overhead we have in the disk cache caused by entries that are in use in some way or another (reading, writing, not-yet-deactivated). Not 100% sure WHEN to probe this number, and whether to do the actual memory calculation or just count the number of active entries and extrapolate as best as possible from there.
comments.creator: u408661@disabled.tld

comments.text:
Comment on attachment 575903
patch

gather-telemetry is an event we fire to give stuff a chance to gather one-off (and possibly async+expensive) telemetry data.
comments.author: taras.mozilla@glek.net
comments.raw_text: gather-telemetry is an event we fire to give stuff a chance to gather one-off (and possibly async+expensive) telemetry data.
Reassigning to default owner, 'cause this will all change when we get our new cache, and someone else will likely be more appropriate to do this then.
